outline:
1. to be good, be kind
    1. (Hithpael) to show kindness to oneself
  2. to be reproached, be ashamed
    1. (Piel) to be put to shame, be reproached
kjv_def: shew self merciful, put to shame.
strongs_def: properly, perhaps to bow (the neck only  in courtesy to an equal), i.e. to be kind; also (by euphemistically, but rarely) to reprove
